title: Tom Weiskopf, British Open Winner and Golf Course Designer, Dies at 79
description: A four-time runner-up at the Masters, he won 16 PGA Tour events starting in the late 1960s and later became a television commentator.
dc:creator: Richard Goldstein
media:description: Tom Weiskopf in 1973 after winning the British Open at the Royal Troon Golf Club in Scotland. It was his only victory in a major tournament.
